idea-plugin.name: JUnit4 Parallel Runner
idea-plugin.description:
A plugin that allows you to run JUnit4 tests in parallel(uses multiple cores/threads to run the selected tests).
Why and when to use it:
  • To speed up running every kind of JUnit4 test including unit tests, integration tests and more...
  • If you have a CPU with more than 4 cores, it will greatly reduce the duration of running JUnit4 tests
  • Works with every kind of framework including Mockito, Spring etc.

Note: The more tests you have, the better the speedup will be.
Let's say you have 1000 tests which need 40 seconds to run and you have a 6 core CPU,
using this plugin you can reduce the duration of tests by approx. 4x (to 10 seconds).
Warning: Some code is not meant to be run in parallel(sometimes this is the case with integration tests).
Also, if you have tests which are not independent of each other, some tests might fail.
